General.Name: Guizhou Bailing Group Pharmaceutical Co Ltd
General.Description: Guizhou Bailing Group Pharmaceutical Co., Ltd. research, develops, produces, and sells medicines in China. The company provides medicines in the form of tablets, capsules, granules, syrups, powders, pills, tinctures, sprays, lotions, and cream for cardiovascular and cerebrovascular diseases, cough, cold, pediatric, and gynecologic diseases. Guizhou Bailing Group Pharmaceutical Co., Ltd. was founded in 1999 and is headquartered in Anshun, China.
General.Address: Eco & Tech Dev Zn, Anshun, China

5.Name: Mr. Wen  Xia
5.Title: Chairman of the Supervisory Board and R&D Director
